column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=It was my sisters birthday recently and she wanted to have a cake , of course .
#id=2
#text=She likes chocolate , so she chose a chocolate cake .
#id=3
#text=We always bake our own cakes rather than purchasing them , so I knew we needed to find a tried and true recipe .
#id=4
#text=We found the recipe from a blog and made a list of the ingredients that we did not already have .
#id=5
#text=We had to do a trip to the grocery store to pick up a few items that are essential to baking a chocolate cake , one of which is baker 's chocolate .
#id=6
#text=Once we got home from the store , we followed the instructions included in the recipe .
#id=7
#text=We started like always ; by pre-heating the oven to the correct temperature .
#id=8
#text=Next , we began to make the cake .
#id=9
#text=First , we make sure dry ingredients are mixed well and then we moved on to the wet ingredients .
#text=This is so important for the distribution of things like the baking soda .
#text=It 's what makes a cake a cake .
#text=When the cake batter was ready and the oven was hot , we poured the batter into a pan and slipped the pan in the oven .
#text=The timer was set for the correct amount of time given by the recipe , and then we just waited .
#text=Once the cake was done we took it out of the oven and set it up to cool before we put on the icing .
#text=The cake turned out beautiful and my sister had a very happy birthday .
